title: The Secrets of Sophia Musgrove: Dancing and Deception
description: Jane Austen meets the Princess Diaries in this new series featuring real-life historical figures alongside a fabulous cast of Regency charactersSophia Musgrove's life is a glittering whirl of parties, dinners, and dances in 1800s Regency London. But Sophia is restless—surely there must be more to life. When a gorgeous mystery man gets Sophia involved in fighting the slave trade, her life is soon full of romance and adventure—but it's a dangerous world, where not everyone is as they seem. Will Sophia's secrets be her downfall? And can she find room for romance when she's trying to change the world?
author: Janey Louise Jones
